463810.name: Bridge Constructor Trains - Expansion Pack
463810.description:
Let's celebrate Bridge Constructor's 4th birthday!
The "Trains" DLC let's you visit the "Choonited Kingdom" island group, with a total of 18 new levels across three islands. Build massive bridges that can withstand the enormous weight of the two new vehicles on offer - a commuter train and a heavily loaded freight train. The idyllic and beautifully designed landscapes will make the heart of every railroad fanatic skip a beat.

  • Open up 3 new islands with 18 new levels.
  • Build bridges for modern commuter trains and heavy freight trains
  • New scenery: Enjoy the view of picturesque mountains and ravines!
